findings.rationale: An indefinite term may lead to perpetual obligations, potentially resulting in unintended liabilities or risks for the Receiving Party.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: Broad definitions of confidential information may lead to ambiguity and disputes regarding what is protected under the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: The obligation to return all confidential information may be burdensome and create operational risks if not clearly defined.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.

findings.rationale: The choice of governing law may introduce complexities if the parties are located in different jurisdictions.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.
